pageTitle: Boxercraft Women's Fleece Touchdown Capri Pants - Soccer Equipment and Gear
textBeforeTable: Garment Measurements - Roomy fit - 2" wide waistband - Features an elastic bottom for scrunching to the knee - Constructed out of soft ringspun 7 oz. 60/40 cotton poly fleece blend Details: Score big with our popular touchdown sweat capris! An old school look on the classic sweat.
